actionConfiguration.body:
select
	visit_status,
	retailer_code,
	visit_id,	
	visit_resolution_type,
	feedback_remarks,
	to_char(created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as created_time,
	created_by,
	new_code,
	request_priority,
	to_char(visit_request_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as visit_request_date,
	visit_request_type,
	request_remarks,
	agent_id,
	to_char(assigned_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as assigned_time,
	to_char(picked_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as picked_time,
	to_char(closed_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi') as closed_time,
	software_version,
	visit_rating
from
	public.support_visit_request
	where retailer_code = {{retailer_code.selectedOptionValue}}
	and visit_project_type='SUPPORT'
	order by closed_time desc limit 20;
